website_summaries.verdict: Go wild with this animal-themed fire pit from Landmann USA.
pros: Sturdy cold-rolled steel fire pit with decorative wildlife cutouts
Includes full-size grate you can use as a portable grill
Spark screen with handle and poker included
Black powder coat of heat-resistant paint
cons: Prone to rust, so be sure to get a cover to keep water out
Consider drilling drainage holes in the bottom

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the Family
customer_reviews.text: Wife and I talked about getting one of these for months. I checked all the local hardware stores and didn't find any that I liked. I was hesitant to order this one due to the price, but my wife and I are very glad I did. We love sitting out by the fire, having a drink, getting the kids to make hot dogs or smores. It's great for the entire family. I did put sand on the bottom. I did not drill holes in it. I place a cover over it when not in use. Some of the paint on the grate to catch the embers has peeled off, but it's not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: My favorite fire pit
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews on this product before I purchased it. It was true that the ring around the outside didn't fit exactly perfectly but is not noticeable once you get past putting it together. I took the recommendations to drill holes in the bottom and use lava rock. Another thing I did that I might recommend is setting the legs on small brick blocks to keep water from pooling around the feet and rusting them. I also recommend a cover. The ambiance created by this fire pit is so worth any extra effort to get it set up. It's great quality for the price. I absolutely love this fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: We all love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Oh, wow! We all love this thing! I looks amazing and works great. We gave it to my husband for Father's Day, honestly because I had been wanting one for our sitting area for a long time, but because of the "manly" looking wildlife cutouts, my husband had to admit that he really likes it, too! The cover fits well, even though it does not cover the feet, but it seems to have kept the rain and wind from doing any damage to it at all. We are also looking forward to trying out the grill--what a great touch! Very sturdy and well-made!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely sized and the animals on the side are beautiful ...
customer_reviews.text: Loving this fire place. Very nicely sized and the animals on the side are beautiful when a fire is lit inside. It has a nice large capacity. It wasn't hard to assemble. It comes with grill rack so if desired you can cook over it. Which we have done and the food turned out beautifully. It would be nice to have a cover come with it but I believe there is one that can be bought separately.
customer_reviews.author: P.E. teacher

customer_reviews.title: Rusting after a two-month use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the fire pit a couple of months ago. It seems solid and esthetically appealing; however, yesterday I noticed the first signs of rusting along the handle. This is very disappointing as I had purchased a cover for the fire pit and I have been using it to protect the fire pit from rain since it has been in use. I was truly hoping that this item would be longer lasting than it seems at this moment.
customer_reviews.author: Martin L.

customer_reviews.title: but the process worked great and the winner of this firepit chose it as ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a prize in a drawing. We offered a quilt, Kindle and this firepit, your choice as your name is called. I was a little nervous as this is more specialized, but the process worked great and the winner of this firepit chose it as exactly what she wanted. The Natural Resources officers recommend that all outdoor fires are in this type of enclosed container. Remember, this moves in the yard, so depending on what you are doing, it is good use.
customer_reviews.author: North Gate Outlander

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful firepit!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Deer Tracks Fire Pit and have now used it several times. It is very nice, the animal cut-outs are quite lovely when a fire is lit, and the firei pit creates a great campfire atmosphere at night with no worries that sparks might start a fire elsewhere. We roasted marshmellows and told campfire stories with the grandkids. We also purchased a cover for it; it is weathering quite well out on the patio. Very pleased wtih it; we just put sand in the bottom as recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Patti P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fire pit!!!
customer_reviews.text: No holes on the bottom for rain drainage but otherwise good!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP CHINA JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made, DO NOT BUY nit worth $50 let alone the $100 I paid. CHEAP CHINA JUNK BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: jdickster

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband can't wait to try this out. It is sturdy and durable. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: D.Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great fireplace!
customer_reviews.text: We assembled this very quickly and it works great and looks super cool!
customer_reviews.author: Misti

customer_reviews.title: Good Size
customer_reviews.text: Little bit larger than average fire pit in this style, has a grate - like a grill, longer poker - two pieces you screw together.
customer_reviews.author: Yokie

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Pain in the neck to put to get her but absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get s’mores
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, contains fire as intended. Kids love making s’mores over the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Fishing Texas

customer_reviews.title: Deep bowl for large logs - stable and portable.
customer_reviews.text: Great fire pit. Deep bowl for large logs and portable.
customer_reviews.author: thejab

customer_reviews.title: It’s important to know how sturdy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This FirePit certainly was a surprise. It’s much bigger than I thought it would be. It’s very sturdy and moveable for a widow. I put it together by myself and my bloodhound approves it also. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but be cautious!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall construction is pretty good, however slight problem with assembly. The outer ring is not round like the base and it appears to be poorly made. Had to force several of the screws to get to work. Now there are gaps along the outside ring where it is supposed to be flush.
customer_reviews.author: darren

customer_reviews.title: Great fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Nice deep fire pit. Though the legs can use some reinforcement ( all fire pit legs seem to fail first ), it is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Haduck

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the back yard!
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room to burn a decent size pile of wood.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Gray

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Only down side was that it was tough to assemble. The ring that goes around it didn't quite want to fit together. With a little wrestling & an extra set of hands, we got it though. Now that's it's together - we love it!!
customer_reviews.author: P. M.

customer_reviews.title: We've Really Enjoyed It
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and sturdy. We've used it quite a bit this year. Great size for a small crowd! The fire glows through the animal shapes in a very pretty way. Lid has bent easily a few times, so 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Sargent

customer_reviews.title: nice for evenings on the porch
customer_reviews.text: bought this for husband...nice for evenings on the porch. i would suggest buying cover or drilling 2 small holes in bottom in case water gets in (has no where to drain)
customer_reviews.author: bellz

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Seems well put together. However, there is no drain at the bottom for rain water. Also wish the grate were a little lower in the barrel for slightly larger fire.
customer_reviews.author: Steven K

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My brother and I bought this as a gift for my parents, and so far war are very happy with this, the deer cut-outs look beautiful with the fire.
customer_reviews.author: BJo

customer_reviews.title: Deer dancing in the firelight
customer_reviews.text: Good unit, well made, stands up to blazing infurno's or glowing embers, all the while the deer dance round and round
customer_reviews.author: Handy Andy E

customer_reviews.title: great fire pit and nice size
customer_reviews.text: Was easy enough to assemble - once I found all the screws scattered around inside the box. The only tricky part was the ring and attaching the final part, I did need a second pair of hands to help push this in to place so that the final screw could go in. It has been sat outside for the last 2 - 3 weeks in rain and sun with no cover, no rust so far - I do intend to bring it in to store during the winter. We have had several large fires in it and just loving it :)
customer_reviews.author: JAOMom

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great item at a great price. We love it and especially the fact it's portable.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Linn

customer_reviews.title: Went together pretty easy. Looks beautiful with a fire going
customer_reviews.text: Use it all the time!! Went together pretty easy. Looks beautiful with a fire going!!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian VonDerLieth

customer_reviews.title: My second fire pit.
customer_reviews.text: I like these fire Kettles, but keep in mind they aren't made to last forever. They do rust. Tip for installing the rail....put the screws in all the way around with a few cranks. After all of the screws are in place, THEN tighten them, otherwise you will have a problem as some of the other reviewers did.
customer_reviews.author: koolbreez

customer_reviews.title: A nightmare to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Trying to assemble this poorly produced Chinese attempt at technology was an exercise in frustration. The mounting holes for the ring sections were drilled at random angles, the mounting pins on the ring sections were welded on crooked, and some of the mounting screws were missing. On the plus side... Your next Ikea assembly will seem like a cake walk!
customer_reviews.author: Terry King

customer_reviews.title: fire
customer_reviews.text: i take this thing everywhere i love this its light and easy to go anywhere i love it thank you
customer_reviews.author: Susan Burkey

customer_reviews.title: fire pit
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for my needs. Contains your fire, is a nice size. Light weight, so easy to move for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Brainard

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly but...
customer_reviews.text: I found the it easy to assemble, but, the handles were difficult to get in the best position. Otherwise it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Bart Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size firepit. Love the design on the outside. Metal lid easily dents.
customer_reviews.author: heartbeats

customer_reviews.title: NICE AND WARM
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the in laws they love it. They live up in the mountains always makes smores when we visit.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great firepit
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and easy to build a fire in and maintain. Good ventilation. One small problem with assembly, one bolt/nut was missing. Otherwise went together nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Galarneau

product_meta.title: Landmann USA 23192 Patio Lights Deer Tracks Fire Pit, 24 x 12.5 inch, Black
product_meta.description: Style:Deer TracksThis durable outdoor fire pit features unique & stylish cutouts that create an incredible fire ambiance on your backyard patio or deck. The sturdy cold-rolled steel construction & heat resistant paint finish create a fire pit that will last for years. The decorative sculpted legs add style; while providing stability & support. The full diameter One" Thick safety ring can be used as a footrest or convenient handle for easy transport. The full size enamel cooking grate transforms your fire pit into a portable grill. Weighing less than 35 lb, the lightweight design makes it easy to take to the beach, lake, campsite or cabin. The deer tracks wildlife cutouts provides 360° viewing of the fire & the large 23. 5" Bowl gives 397 square" Of burn surface area. A safety spark screen protects you from stray sparks & the included poker makes it easy to tend to the fire. Easy to assemble & exceptionally sturdy, the fire pit measures 29. 5 x 29. 5 x 23" & weighs 24. 2 lb. Black finish.
feature_bullets: Sturdy Steel fire pit with decorative cutouts that cast wildlife shadows while you enjoy the warmth of a fire
Includes a full size cooking grate that can be used as a portable grill
Spark screen with handle and poker included
Measures 29. 5 x 29. 5 x 23. 5-inch in a black powder coat

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars457 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
